mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CONVERT(MAP_SORT, SIGNED INTEGER) , MAP_ID , IFNULL(T_ENG_TABLE_NAME ,'NULL') AS T_ENG_TABLE_NAME , IFNULL(T_KOR_TABLE_NAME ,'NULL') AS T_KOR_TABLE_NAME , IFNULL(T_ENG_COLUMN_NAME ,'NULL') AS T_ENG_COLUMN_NAME , IFNULL(T_KOR_COLUMN_NAME ,'NULL') AS T_KOR_COLUMN_NAME , IFNULL(T_DATA_TYPE ,'NULL') AS T_DATA_TYPE , IFNULL(T_LENGTH1 ,'NULL') AS T_LENGTH1 , IFNULL(T_LENGTH2 ,'NULL') AS T_LENGTH2 , IFNULL(T_PK ,'NULL') AS T_PK , IFNULL(A_SYSTEM_NAME ,'NULL') AS A_SYSTEM_NAME , IFNULL(A_OWNER ,'NULL') AS A_OWNER , IFNULL(A_ENG_TABLE_NAME ,'NULL') AS A_ENG_TABLE_NAME , IFNULL(A_KOR_TABLE_NAME ,'NULL') AS A_KOR_TABLE_NAME , IFNULL(A_ENG_COLUMN_NAME ,'NULL') AS A_ENG_COLUMN_NAME , IFNULL(A_KOR_COLUMN_NAME ,'NULL') AS A_KOR_COLUMN_NAME , IFNULL(A_DATA_TYPE ,'NULL') AS A_DATA_TYPE , IFNULL(A_LENGTH1 ,'NULL') AS A_LENGTH1 , IFNULL(A_LENGTH2 ,'NULL') AS A_LENGTH2 , IFNULL(A_PK ,'NULL') AS A_PK , IFNULL(MOVE_DEFAULT ,'NULL') AS MOVE_DEFAULT , IFNULL(MOVE_YN ,'NULL') AS MOVE_YN , IFNULL(MOVE_RULE ,'NULL') AS MOVE_RULE , IFNULL(MOVE_SQL ,'NULL') AS MOVE_SQL , IFNULL(ALT_DT ,'NULL') AS ALT_DT , IFNULL(JOB_OWNER ,'NULL') AS 업무담당자 , CLIENT_OWNER , MOVE_OWNER FROM META_TABLE_MAP WHERE ( ('1' = '${INQ_CON}' AND T_ENG_TABLE_NAME = ( CASE WHEN '${IN_TBL}'='%' THEN T_ENG_TABLE_NAME ELSE '${IN_TBL}' END) AND T_ENG_COLUMN_NAME = ( CASE WHEN '${IN_COL}'='%' THEN T_ENG_COLUMN_NAME ELSE '${IN_COL}' END)) OR ('2' = '${INQ_CON}' AND A_ENG_TABLE_NAME = ( CASE WHEN '${IN_TBL}'='%' THEN A_ENG_TABLE_NAME ELSE '${IN_TBL}' END) AND A_ENG_COLUMN_NAME = ( CASE WHEN '${IN_COL}'='%' THEN A_ENG_COLUMN_NAME ELSE '${IN_COL}' END))) ) A ORDER BY 2, 1
